content:
# We have successfully gathered 10 units of iron ore, bringing our inventory to include 10 coal, 5 stone, 10 iron ore, and 4 copper plates.
# The copper furnace is still operational, producing copper plates, while the first furnace is idle due to a lack of iron ore.

# Now, let's return to the first stone furnace to smelt the newly gathered iron ore into iron plates.
# We will need to insert coal and iron ore into the furnace to get the smelting process started.

# Move back to the position of the first stone furnace.
move_to(Position(x=-14.0, y=-14.0))  # Move to the position of the first furnace

# Insert coal and iron ore into the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 units of coal
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert all 10 units of iron ore

# After this, we should check the inventory and the state of the entities again.
print(f"Final Inventory: {inspect_inventory()} after inserting items into the furnace.")  # Check inventory
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()} after inserting items.")  # Check entities status again.
